title: T206 Dahlen Boston Piedmont 350 on eBay

posts.post_title: T206 Dahlen Boston Piedmont 350 on eBay
posts.post_content:
Did anyone happen to snag this the other day?

[url]https://www.ebay.com/itm/194810763047?hash=item2d5ba05727:g:fHMAAOSwWjliBAOJ[/url]
Thats funny Nate...check out the post I just submitted on the February pick up thread

[quote name="RCFire82" post=2196559]Thats funny Nate...check out the post I just submitted on the February pick up thread[/QUOTE]

Ouch!  I missed it by several hours.  I never seem to be looking at the right time, haha!

for what its worth, and it might not be worth it to you, there is a good website called automatedsearches. you can use a free account, or you can pay for a premium service. the free account will send you alerts every 15 minutes when new items hit ebay, the premium version (i think its $30 a month) will scrape every minute. you can get text alerts, and when you click the text, it will open the ebay app for you. makes it a lot easier to get those BINs fast, faster than just randomly refreshing ebay. of course, it is up to you to determine if that advantage is worth $30 a month.

[quote name="53toppscollector" post=2196630]for what its worth, and it might not be worth it to you, there is a good website called automatedsearches. you can use a free account, or you can pay for a premium service. the free account will send you alerts every 15 minutes when new items hit ebay, the premium version (i think its $30 a month) will scrape every minute. you can get text alerts, and when you click the text, it will open the ebay app for you. makes it a lot easier to get those BINs fast, faster than just randomly refreshing ebay. of course, it is up to you to determine if that advantage is worth $30 a month.[/QUOTE]

Great, thanks!
